resources.string:
My name is Isaac Miti. 

\I am a digital designer, front end developer, aspiring mobile developer currently learning Android. I contribute to open source projects in my spare time. 

I play Fortnite on a regular basis. My GitHub username is ikayz. 

\I have been learning mobile development in Android using Kotlin. 

\I practice my Android and Kotlin skills every time I get the chance. 

Consistency is key when it comes to getting good at something 

Code is Science is journal policy tracker, that checks if scientific code has policies implemented and is reproducible. About Scientific code needs to be open source and peer reviewed
